scripts.build:clean: pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build
scripts.publish: pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build && pnpm publish -r --filter='./packages/*'
scripts.publish:alpha: pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build && pnpm publish -r --no-git-checks --filter='./packages/*' --tag alpha
